title: Creamy courgette and spinach soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '500g courgette, diced', '1 onion, coarsely chopped', '150g spinach', '1 potato, peeled and diced', '1 tablespoon parsley, finely chopped', '1L vegetable stock', '225ml cream', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
